name: Pong (itch) (MadritB)
description:
Score against your enemy to win the game. This is a remake of pong (bad than original) but still fun to play. 

Features-

1. You can adjust the game difficulty between 4 modes - easy, medium, hard and insane.

2. You can adjust the winning score from 1 - 21.

## AI not added yet, can only be played between two players. ##
